author: Sarah Kent
title: Pollution Worsens Around Shell Oil Spills in Nigeria
text:
LONDONâ€”The environmental damage around the site of two Royal Dutch Shell PLC oil spills in Nigeria a decade ago has worsened significantly after years of delay to cleanup efforts, according to a report that the oil giant has been accused of trying to shield from public view.
